institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 36 (Project period and area)
contents: Article 36 (Project Period and Area) ① The project implementation period (hereinafter referred to as *project period) shall be from the first day of each year to the last day of the year within the scope of the agreed upon period for each institution, and the performance of the relevant business period shall be evaluated and The Center may suspend support or reduce the amount of support., ② If necessary for efficient performance of the project, each selected institution may designate an area where the project can be carried out by dividing it into jurisdictional areas.
